author: GamingBolt
description:
The PlayStation 5 has cemented its place as a great choice for those looking at picking up a gaming console that’s powerful, feature packed, and able to deliver gaming experiences that stand out. 

And while the PS5 has largely delivered on the value that it promised, Sony’s changing approaches to the platform’s future might have derailed its success a little. However, it continues to be a great year for PlayStation owners, and that seems poised to go on well into 2026. 

With potentially great first-party exclusives and some amazing third-party titles already lined up for 2026, the PS5’s mid-life phase stands as ready as it has been over the past five years, with perhaps even more value than its beefier cousin thanks to its pricing.
title: Five Years Later, Is The PS5 Worth It?

author: GamingBolt
description:
From the depths of cancellation to emerging as one of the most successful games in the franchise, S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl has had a long journey since releasing last year for Xbox Series X/S and PC. 

It's finally coming to PS5 on November 20th, but it's far from the same game as last year. What's changed, and if you're new to the franchise, what makes it worth playing? Join us as we dive into everything you should know before buying.
title: STALKER 2 PS5 - EVERYTHING You Need To Know Before You Buy
